item.title: Adding Plots to a Post
item.description: One of the main requirements in order to publish Jupyter notebooks is to be able to attach images to the posts. In this post, I focus on how to attach images, and in finding a standard for the images (like fonts, background and style). How to attach an image with Hugo In order to attach an image to a post, I follow this Stackoverflow post. I create a folder for the images under the static folder:
